name: Connect 4 (itch) (OctoManGames)
description:
Play the classic Connect 4 against the AI and try to win! Good Luck.

Notes!

First Alpha Release V2 - Reload the Page to run another Game against the AI.

How to Play:

  1. Player Goes First!
  2. Click a Row to Place a Coin (RED)!
  3. Try to Connect 4 Coins in a Row(Horizontal, Vertical, Diagonal)
  4. Have Fun!
